archiefmat.titel_eng: Government Secretary's office of the colony of Suriname
archiefmat.notes: The archive consists of three parts: 1. Government Secretary's office until 1816; 2. Government Secretary's office, 1816-1828; 3. Office of the military command, 1823-1828.
archiefmat.Aantekeningen:
level:

 

Archief bestaat uit drie onderdelen: 1. Gouvernementssecretarie tot 1816, Gouvernementssecretarie, 1816-1828, Bureau van het militair commandement, 1823-1828.
